title: GET_VEHICLE_DOOR_STATUS
content:
0x6E35C49C// GetVehicleDoorStatus
int GET_VEHICLE_DOOR_STATUS(Vehicle vehicle, int doorIndex);Parameters:vehicle: The target vehicle.doorIndex: Index of door to check (0-6).Returns: A number from 0 to 7.Returns the open position of the specified door on the target vehicle.
codeBlocks:
// GetVehicleDoorStatus
int GET_VEHICLE_DOOR_STATUS(Vehicle vehicle, int doorIndex);
